post_title: Sold - T206 Frank Chance Polar Bear - PSA 4
post_content:
For Sale - T206 Frank Chance Polar Bear - PSA 4  $old, price  includes shipping.    Since the beginning of the year it looks like 3 similar cards graded 4 have sold, an SGC 4 PB for $760 and 2 other 4's with common backs for $645 and $537.50 without considering tax and shipping costs. 

Please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note:  NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover ST.
Quick bump for one time price change.
